Title: CityLights
Writer: Sean Ellis (original story), Ritesh Shah (adapted by)
Actors: Rajkummar Rao, Patralekhaa, Manav Kaul, Khushboo Upadhyay
Plot: Deepak Singh is a farmer in Rajasthan. After a tragedy, he migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child to lead a better life. However, upon arriving, he soon discovers the challenges of life in a big city.
